naslov: Royal Canin Medium Adult - Dry Food for Medium Dogs
opis: Royal Canin Medium Adult is a complete and balanced food for adult dogs of medium size (11-25 kg). It contains all the necessary nutrients to maintain optimal health of your pet. The formulation is specially adapted for medium-sized dogs with specific nutritional needs.

karakteristike: Cereals, meat and meat derivatives, vegetable derivatives, oils and fats
Vitamin A: 15500 IU, Vitamin D3: 1000 IU, Iron: 42 mg

naslov: Whiskas Tuna - Canned Food for Cats
opis: Whiskas Tuna is a delicious canned food for cats with tuna in jelly. It contains high-quality proteins from tuna, vitamins and minerals that support your pet's health. Ideal for daily nutrition or as a treat.

karakteristike: Meat and meat derivatives (tuna 4%), cereals, minerals
Vitamin D3: 200 IU, Iron: 9.6 mg, Copper: 1 mg

opis: TetraMin is a high-quality granular food for tropical freshwater fish. Contains all necessary nutrients, vitamins and minerals for healthy growth and fish coloration. Granules sink slowly allowing all fish to eat.
